## ziti demo ziti-echo-server

Runs a ziti-based http echo service

```
ziti demo ziti-echo-server [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for ziti-echo-server
      --identity string   Specify the config file to use (default "echo-server.json")
```
